doc.field: Helen M. Stummer photographs and papers
Helen M. Stummer photographs and papers

Series I. Photographs includes twenty-two 11x14 black and white photographs taken on East 6th Street between 1977 and 1980. The photographs have been loosely arranged by subject. Seven photographs show a woman named Shirley and her four children over a period of two years. Other photographs show individual portraits of children, street scenes of children and adults playing and lounging, and a few images of adults and children. Each photograph has been titled, dated, and signed by the photographer on the verso of each photograph. Titles recorded below are transcribed from the verso.
Photographs are arranged loosely by subject, and thereunder by date. Titles are the photographer's.
Helen M. Stummer photographs and papers
